item.title: Google assistant with Wordpress blog
item.description:
Google assistant chat app that

fetch the new recent blog from creole Studios website.

  • Made With Express and node Js Backend.
  • Used WP Rest API To get response from the Website.
  • Chat UI Powerd By Google Assistant SDK Response API.
  • Platform Of hosting Glitch
  • See Demo On Glitch.

Thanks. Built With ❤️ For amazing People.

Please open the Google assistant in your 📱 mobile phone. and Say Talk to Creole Studios Blog Then You can say one line Given below.

  • Get recent blog.
  • Get new blog.
  • Get Blog.

It will fetch the recent Blog from the Our website. 👍

If you get the error, Please do second time.

Becuase Glitch is Free platform that sleeps after 5 minute of inactivity.

your first request is Wakes up server and Second time you’ll get output.

list all your valuable suggestions directly on GitHub.


If it is helpful¬†and saves your valuable Time ‚è± please show your support üëá.
Buy me A Coffee, Thank you and canva ( For Beautiful designs ). Thanks for the reading üëç.
